sn48.44:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbakoṭṭhake.
sn48.44:4.3: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi:
sn48.44:4.4: “saddahasi tvaṃ, sāriputta—
sn48.44:4.5: saddhindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amataparāyaṇaṃ amatapariyosānaṃ … pe …
sn48.44:4.6: paññindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amataparāyaṇaṃ amatapariyosānan”ti?
sn48.44:5.1: “Na khvāhaṃ ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi—
sn48.44:5.3: paññindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amataparāyaṇaṃ amatapariyosānaṃ.
sn48.44:5.4: Yesañhetaṃ, bhante, aññātaṃ assa adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ aphassitaṃ paññāya, te tattha paresaṃ saddhāya gaccheyyuṃ—
sn48.44:5.6: paññindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amataparāyaṇaṃ amatapariyosānaṃ.
sn48.44:5.7: Yesañca kho etaṃ, bhante, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya, nikkaṅkhā te tattha nibbicikicchā—
sn48.44:5.9: paññindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amataparāyaṇaṃ amatapariyosānaṃ.
sn48.44:5.10: Mayhañca kho etaṃ, bhante, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.
sn48.44:5.12: paññindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amataparāyaṇaṃ amatapariyosānan”ti.
